tool.name: Get.sabund
tool.description: Get sabund from a otu list or rabund
tool.command:
echo 'get.sabund( #if $label: label=${ str($label).replace(",","-") }, #end if #if $count: count=$count, #end if #if $otu.is_of_type("mothur.list"): list=$otu #elif $otu.is_of_type("mothur.rabund"): rabund=$otu #end if )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$otu" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.sabund "$sabund"

param.name: count
param.help: If your list file contains only the unique sequence names because you ran cluster with a count file, be sure to include the count file.

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The get.sabund_ command generates an sabund_ file from a list_ or rabund_ file.
.. _sabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Sabund_file .. _list: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/List_file .. _rabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Rabund_file .. _get.sabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.sabund
